mapper.insert: INSERT INTO survey(surveyno, topic, startdate, enddate, cnt, visible, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1) VALUES(survey_seq.nextval, #{topic}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{cnt}, #{visible}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1})
mapper.select: SELECT surveyno, topic, startdate, enddate, cnt, visible, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM survey ORDER BY surveyno ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE survey SET visible='Y' WHERE surveyno=#{surveyno}
UPDATE survey SET visible='N' WHERE surveyno=#{surveyno}
